name: gallinga-multiprovider-generator
description: Función para generar imágenes con múltiples proveedores de IA (Google y OpenAI).

scripts.deploy:generarImagenGallinga: gcloud functions deploy generarImagenGallinga --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point generarImagenGallinga --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy:leonardoCallbackHandler: gcloud functions deploy leonardoCallbackHandler --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point leonardoCallbackHandler --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy:getGallingaJobStatus: gcloud functions deploy getGallingaJobStatus --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point getGallingaJobStatus --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy:obtenerGaleria: gcloud functions deploy obtenerGaleria --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point obtenerGaleria --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy:finalizarCreacionGallinga: gcloud functions deploy finalizarCreacionGallinga --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point finalizarCreacionGallinga --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy:eliminarCreacionGallinga: gcloud functions deploy eliminarCreacionGallinga --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point eliminarCreacionGallinga --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy:rateImageGallinga: gcloud functions deploy rateImageGallinga --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point rateImageGallinga --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy:borrarTodoRastroImagen: gcloud functions deploy borrarTodoRastroImagen --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --project gallinga-project --region europe-west1 --source . --entry-point borrarTodoRastroImagen --trigger-http --service-account gallinga-executor@gallinga-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:generarImagenGallinga && npm run deploy:leonardoCallbackHandler && npm run deploy:getGallingaJobStatus && npm run deploy:obtenerGaleria && npm run deploy:finalizarCreacionGallinga && npm run deploy:eliminarCreacionGallinga && npm run deploy:rateImageGallinga && npm run deploy:borrarTodoRastroImagen

author: PuraKasaka
